headline: Words From Our Patients
description: Hear from the families and patients who trust us with their smiles.

testimonials.quote: Dr. Asad is an expert at amalgam removal without exposing the patient to mercury during removal as well as in ozone treatments. Various biological dentistry options offered. Initially I was referred to him by a friend for this reason.
My family and I have been going here for years and I wouldn't think to go to another dentist. Friendliest staff that are always accommodating and understanding.
Possibly one of the best places to get your work done. Everyone was so nice and reliable! You can tell they are customer-first!
